resources.string: Welcome to the world of gaming

Honkai star rail is a turn-based role-playing game that is published by the incredibly popular chinese company called miHoYo. It has a typical gacha monetization system in which players can obtain characters and weapons for a form of currency which can be obtained freely in the game but also purchased for real money for the people that enjoy doing that. The game itself is very sci-fi themed in which you go around and do different missions in different regions trying your best to calm the war in universe travelling through the vast space.
